name: CourseTowerDefense
description:
Game prototype having for theme  :  the race.

It's a two players split-screen game, one driving and the second create turret and control them to slow down the car. When the first driver hit the end line, they switch. 

Controls :

zqsd for the driver.

the mouse left click for instantiate towers and shooting when you are the tower. Right click to switch to the next tower and arrow keys to move the camera when you build towers.

Have Fun.
